text: New Zealand's Wyatt Crockett, who retired after 202 Super Rugby matches, the most played for any centurion Stephen Moore is the top Australian centurion, retiring after 176 Super Rugby matches Tendai Mtawarira is the top South African centurion, retiring after 159 Super Rugby matches Australia's Ashley- Cooper is the most prolific active player, with 154 Super Rugby matches Samuel Whitelock is the highest ranked active New Zealand player, with 143 Super Rugby matches Below is a listing of all Super Rugby players that have appeared in 100 or more matches during their career: {|
